name: Lucy Thackery
description: AfterVrescued her from theMaelstrom,Regina Jonessent Lucy toMuamar Reyeswhile her brother Bertie left thecity. Lucy felt she could help more people and did not want to leave yet, so Reyes sent her toOctavio'sclinicin the slums nearCoronado DaminRancho Coronado, as they needed an expert ripperdoc. To keep a low profile, she took the cover name of "Mia."
